Each line starts by pressing left mouse button when mouse is on one of black dots and and ends by releasing the button on another dots with color determined by the values of red, green, and blue. Make a creative set of lines. 
 Red:<input type="number" id="Red" value=250 STYLE="color:#f00; font-size:18px;" min=0 max=255>
 Green:<input type="number" id="Green" value=50 STYLE="color:#0f0; font-size:18px;" min=0 max=255>
 Blue:<input type="number" id="Blue" value=50 STYLE="color:#00f; font-size:18px;" min=0 max=255>figure(Weird Drawing0)
